item.title: 欧洲最热门的新信贷交易都与国防有关
item.description: 6 月底，北约领导人在海牙聚首，商讨大幅增加军费开支的计划时，伦敦的银行家们正忙着统计投资者对捷克一家鲜为人知的装甲车和弹药制造商所发行债券的订单。【原文：As NATO leaders huddled in The Hague in late June to iron out a plan to radically boost military spending, bankers in London were busy adding up the investor orders for a bond being offered by a little-known Czech maker of armored vehicles and ammunition.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯希望分拆海军部队以利用欧洲防务热潮
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯公司（Thyssenkrupp AG）正着手裁撤其军舰部门，希望借助欧洲国防开支激增的东风，同时退出这一长期以来发展缓慢、成本高昂且难以扩大规模的业务。【原文：Thyssenkrupp AG is moving to cut loose its warship unit, hoping to ride a surge in European defense spending while stepping back from a business that has long been slow, costly, and hard to scale.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚因通胀飙升风险将维持利率不变：决策指南
item.description: 在为帮助抑制预算赤字而掀起的增税浪潮预计将导致通胀飙升之前，罗马尼亚准备维持借贷成本不变。【原文：Romania is poised to keep borrowing costs unchanged ahead of an expected surge in inflation from a wave of tax hikes designed to help curb the budget deficit.】

item.title: 特朗普意外获选美联储主席为其赢得时间
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统临时填补美联储一个职位的举动为他提供了一个在央行安插盟友的机会，同时也给了他更多的时间来权衡一个更大的决定：谁将成为下一任美联储主席。【原文：President Donald Trump’s move to fill a slot at the Federal Reserve on a temporary basis offers him a chance to install an ally at the central bank, while giving him more time to weigh an even larger decision: who will be the next Fed Chair.】

item.title: 英国与津巴布韦重启关系，力争获得关键矿产
item.description: 津巴布韦和英国在近三十年的紧张关系后重启外交关系，原因是全球对重要矿产的需求激增，促使前殖民国家与这个资源丰富的国家达成了 10 亿美元的交易。【原文：Zimbabwe and the UK are rekindling diplomatic ties after almost three decades of tension, driven by a global surge in demand for critical minerals that’s led the former colonial power to pursue $1 billion in deals with the resource-rich nation.】

item.title: 印尼基准收益率降至近两年来最低点
item.description: 由于降息预期升温、海外资金流入和美元走软，印尼10年期国债收益率跌至2023年9月以来的最低水平。【原文：Indonesia’s 10-year government bond yield fell to the lowest level since September 2023 due to rising interest-rate cuts expectations, overseas inflows and a soft US dollar.】

item.title: 印尼将两名议员列为工商局贪污案首批嫌疑人
item.description: 印尼反贪局已确定两名议员为涉嫌腐败案的首批嫌疑人，该案涉及印尼央行和印尼金融服务监管机构。【原文：The Indonesian anti-graft agency has identified two lawmakers as the first suspects in an alleged corruption case involving the central bank and the country’s financial services regulator.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官被数十年的中国芯片投资和董事会工作所困扰
item.description: 三十多年来，陈立武在中国经济繁荣时期进行投资，下了很多不费吹灰之力的赌注，使世界各地和美国的风险投资家和基金经理们赚得盆满钵满。【原文：For more than three decades, Lip-Bu Tan invested in the Chinese economic boom, placing the kinds of no-brainer bets that enriched venture capitalists and fund managers around the world and across the US.】

item.title: 新世界正与 Blackstone、凯德置地洽谈资产出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，新世界发展有限公司正在与包括黑石集团（Blackstone Inc.【原文：New World Development Co. is in talks with several potential investors including Blackstone Inc. and CapitaLand Group Pte. as the cash-strapped Hong Kong developer seeks to dispose of assets to improve liquidity, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度主要养老基金利用新规减少债券购买量
item.description: 印度最大的养老基金正在远离国家主权债券，因为法规的改变允许它们增持股票。【原文：India’s biggest pension funds are pivoting away from the nation’s sovereign bonds after a change in regulations allowed them to beef up their stock holdings.】

item.title: 关税忧虑笼罩前景，印度市场面临损失
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 以色列安全内阁批准夺取加沙城计划
item.description: 以色列安全内阁已批准本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理全面控制加沙城的计划，以最后一搏推翻哈马斯，结束长达 22 个月的战斗。【原文：Israel’s security cabinet has approved Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s plans to take full control of Gaza City in a final push to topple Hamas and end 22 months of fighting.】

item.title: 美元走软缓解亚洲货币捍卫者的压力
item.description: 对亚洲各国央行来说，最坏的情况可能已经过去，因为在美元回升和美国新关税加剧整个地区的压力之后，亚洲各国央行已经加大了捍卫本币的力度。【原文：The worst may be over for Asia’s central banks that have ramped up efforts defending local currencies after a resurgent dollar and fresh US tariffs fueled pressure across the region.】

item.title: 腾讯、京东、鸿海应对美国关税风险，拓展人工智能领域
item.description: 与全球同行相比，中国科技巨头腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd.）和京东商城（JD.com Inc. ）受美国关税的影响仍然较大，自美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）4月份宣布加征关税以来，该行业的盈利预期有所减弱。【原文：Chinese tech giants Tencent Holdings Ltd., and JD.com Inc. remain more exposed to US tariffs than global peers, with sector earnings expectations having weakened since President Donald Trump’s April tariff announcements.】

item.title: 中国南方城市在法庭听证前面临债务计划压力
item.description: 开发商中国南城控股有限公司（China South City Holdings Ltd.）正面临着越来越大的压力，因为在周一的清算听证会之前，该公司与债权人的债务重组谈判已进入尾声。【原文：Developer China South City Holdings Ltd. is facing growing pressure as its debt restructuring talks with creditors go down to the wire ahead of a liquidation hearing on Monday.】

item.title: 菲律宾总统马科斯称禁止在线赌博是为了打击非法运营
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr.【原文：Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. said a total ban on online gambling platforms will lead to a proliferation of illicit operations which will be more difficult to eradicate.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司因油价低迷和成本增加而业绩未达预期
item.description: 巴西国有控股石油生产商巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）公布的业绩低于预期，并在油价下跌抵消了强劲的产量数据后削减了股息。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled oil producer Petrobras reported weaker-than-expected results and cut its dividend after lower oil prices offset stronger production figures.】

item.title: 摘要：日本央行可能在今年年底前退出观望模式
item.description: 根据日本央行上周政策会议的意见摘要，一位日本央行董事会成员暗示，日本央行可能会根据美国关税的影响在年底前再次加息。【原文：A Bank of Japan board member hinted that the BOJ may be moving toward another rate hike by the end of the year depending on the impact from US tariffs, according to a summary of opinions from the bank’s policy meeting last week.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称美国出人意料地增加金条关税对瑞士造成打击
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，美国政府已对进口一公斤重的金条征收关税，有可能撼动金银市场，并对瑞士贸易造成打击。【原文：The US government has placed tariffs on imports of one-kilogram gold bars, threatening to shake up the bullion market and dealing a blow to Swiss trade, the Financial Times has reported.】

item.title: 打造新型加密货币囤积者的冲刺计划连支持者都感到担忧
item.description: 将上市公司转化为购买加密货币的工具的热潮已经达到了白热化的程度，就连支持此类交易的高管们也在警告数字资产价格可能会受到影响。【原文：The rush to convert listed companies into vehicles for buying cryptocurrencies has reached such a fever pitch that even executives backing such deals are warning of potential fallout for digital-asset prices.】

item.title: Meta 选择 Pimco 和 Blue Owl 为其 290 亿美元数据中心融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，随着人工智能竞赛的白热化，Meta Platforms 公司已选择太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. has selected Pacific Investment Management Co. and Blue Owl Capital Inc. to lead a $29 billion financing for its data center expansion in rural Louisiana as the artificial intelligence race heats up, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美联储理事人选引发黄金创一个月来最大单周涨幅
item.description: 随着美国一系列关税的生效，以及唐纳德-特朗普总统任命了一位临时美联储理事，预计该理事将响应他降低利率的呼吁，黄金有望创下一个月来的最大单周涨幅。【原文：Gold was on track for its biggest weekly climb in a month as a slew of US tariffs came into effect and as President Donald Trump named a temporary Federal Reserve governor expected to echo his calls for lower interest rates.】

item.title: 医疗技术公司 Heartflow 3.17 亿美元的首次公开募股定价高于区间价格
item.description: Heartflow 公司在首次公开募股中募集到 3.17 亿美元，股票定价高于市场定价范围的上限。【原文：Heartflow Inc. raised $317 million in its initial public offering, pricing shares above the top of a marketed range.】

item.title: 美元暴跌导致澳大利亚人向对冲基金投入创纪录的资金量
item.description: 今年美元的暴跌正在说服澳大利亚的个人投资者为他们在美国的投资寻求保护，其中一个受欢迎的货币对冲基金吸引了创纪录的资金流入。【原文：The slump in the US dollar this year is convincing Australia’s individual investors to seek protection for their American investments, with one popular currency-hedged fund drawing record inflows.】

item.title: 日本称美国同意停止叠加关税并削减汽车征税
item.description: 东京最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世在华盛顿与美国贸易谈判代表会晤后表示，美国确认将结束对日本的叠加普遍关税，并将按照承诺削减汽车关税。【原文：The US confirmed it would end stacking of universal tariffs on Japan and cut car levies as promised, Tokyo’s top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa said after a meeting with his counterparts in Washington.】

item.title: 美国提高对委内瑞拉马杜罗贩毒指控的悬赏金额
item.description: 美国悬赏 5000 万美元逮捕委内瑞拉的尼古拉斯-马杜罗，并谴责他是世界上最大的毒贩之一，就在华盛顿恢复了一个关键的石油许可证之后不久，这个许可证可能会加强这位陷入困境的社会主义领导人。【原文：The US set a $50 million reward for the arrest of Venezuela’s Nicolas Maduro, denouncing him as one of the world’s largest drug traffickers shortly after Washington restored a key oil license that could strengthen the embattled socialist leader.】

item.title: 关税报告公布后，纽约黄金期货价格飙升超过现货价格
item.description: 周五亚洲市场开盘时，纽约黄金期货溢价跳涨，此前《金融时报》报道称，一公斤重的金条进口现在须缴纳美国关税。【原文：The premium for gold futures in New York jumped as markets opened in Asia on Friday, following a Financial Times report that said imports of one-kilogram bullion bars are now subject to US tariffs.】

item.title: Cboe 威胁和 Ticker 故障扩大了澳大利亚证券交易所的困境
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司（ASX Ltd. ）正努力应对不断上升的监管压力和日益加剧的竞争，澳大利亚主要交易所运营商的股价落后于全球大多数同行。【原文：ASX Ltd. is grappling with rising regulatory pressure and intensifying competition, as shares of Australia’s main exchange operator trail most of its global peers.】

item.title: 俄罗斯供应成焦点，石油每周暴跌 5
item.description: 石油创下6月以来的最大单周跌幅，因为交易商判断美国结束乌克兰战争的努力不会影响供应，即使华盛顿对印度进口莫斯科原油实施了惩罚。【原文：Oil headed for the biggest weekly loss since June, as traders judged that US efforts to end to the war in Ukraine would not impact supplies, even as Washington imposed penalties on India for importing Moscow’s crude.】

item.title: Blackstone、Thoma Bravo 正与 Iress 就可能的交易进行谈判
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 和 Thoma Bravo 正与澳大利亚金融技术软件公司 Iress Ltd. 就可能的收购进行早期谈判，该公司的估值可能约为 20 亿澳元（13 亿美元）。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and Thoma Bravo are in early stage talks with Australian financial technology software firm Iress Ltd. over a possible takeover that could value the firm at about A$2 billion ($1.3 billion).】
